name: Color Gamut Analysis
description: Detects out-of-gamut or unnaturally distributed colors. AI images often produce colors that exceed the natural camera gamut with excessive vibrancy.
algorithm: Color Gamut Range and Saturation Distribution Analysis
mechanism: Measures extreme, near-clipping, and high-saturation-high-brightness pixel ratios to identify AI-generated color patterns.
parameters: Sampling: 50000 pixels, Metrics: extreme ratio, clip ratio, vibrant ratio
useCase: Identifying unnaturally vibrant colors in AI-generated content
